column8: text

JOHOR BARU: An Umno man died after he choked on a piece of kuih koci (glutinous rice cake), just hours after paying his last respects to former state speaker Datuk Mohd Ali Hassan.Samsi Sarpan, 56, who was a Mersing Umno division committee member, choked on the rice cake at about 10.30am on Friday.He died at Hospital Sultanah Aminah and his body was sent to Kampung Pertanian in Kulai for burial.Police confirmed that the case has been classified as sudden death.Read more at http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...gde7WjKa3soF.99WgdZsf9hjHc

If choking is occurring, the Red Cross recommends a "five-and-five" approach to delivering first aid:1.    Give 5 back blows. First, deliver five back blows between the person's shoulder blades with the heel of your hand.2.    Give 5 abdominal thrusts. Perform five abdominal thrusts (also known as the Heimlich maneuver).3.    Alternate between 5 blows and 5 thrusts until the blockage is dislodged.http://www.mayoclinic.org/first-aid/first-...cs/art-20056637
